it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs

Class LightSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs.Plug<EV3.InputPort>
      • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs.AbstractSensor
        • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs.LightSensor

  • public class LightSensor
extends AbstractSensor
    Instances of this class allow operations on the light sensor connected to EV3 via an input port.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LightSensor.Color
      This enum type represents the possible colors returned by the sensor in device mode EV3-Color-RGB-Raw.
      static class  LightSensor.Rgb
      This class represents a raw RGB color value via a triple of integers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Short> getAmbient()
      Get the ambient light from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-Ambient).
      java.util.concurrent.Future<LightSensor.Color> getColor()
      Get the color value from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-Color).
      java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Short> getReflected()
      Get the reflected light from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-Reflected).
      java.util.concurrent.Future<LightSensor.Rgb> getRgb()
      Deprecated. 
      On current EV3 firmwares this command seems to return wrong or imprecise values. Use at own risk.

    • Method Detail

      • getReflected

        @NonNull
public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Short> getReflected()
                                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Get the reflected light from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-Reflected). Sets the sensor LED color to red.
        Returns:
        a Future object hosting the 16-bit integer within the range [ 0 - 100 ] returned by EV3.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.

      • getAmbient

        @NonNull
public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Short> getAmbient()
                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Get the ambient light from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-Ambient). Sets the sensor LED color to blue (dimly lit).
        Returns:
        a Future object hosting the 16-bit integer within the range [ 0 - 100 ] returned by EV3.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.

      • getColor

        @NonNull
public java.util.concurrent.Future<LightSensor.Color> getColor()
                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Get the color value from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-Color). Sets the sensor LED color to white (all LEDs rapidly cycling).
        Returns:
        a Future object hosting the value of type LightSensor.Color returned by EV3.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.

      • getRgb

        @Deprecated
 @NonNull
public java.util.concurrent.Future<LightSensor.Rgb> getRgb()
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. On current EV3 firmwares this command seems to return wrong or imprecise values. Use at own risk.
        Get the raw RGB values from the sensor (device mode EV3-Color-RGB-Raw). Sets the sensor LED color to white (all LEDs rapidly cycling).
        Returns:
        a Future object hosting the object of type LightSensor.Rgb returned by EV3.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.
